Title: Hello Junglist!
Body: I'm an American living and working in Germany. My interests range from filmmaking to music theory. With a variety of experience in different multimedia disciplines, including MC'ing. You can usually catch me grooving alongside some of the coolest DJs in and around the 'Mittelfranken' region.

ContactData.label: @MCScrpt
ContactData.text: Feel free to contact me. I like to talk about music.
